structure.unit: DIVISION OF INSURANCE AND INSURANCE GENERALLY (Superseded)

law.history: Repealed 1950 Ky. Acts ch. 21, sec. 2. -- Repealed and reenacted 1948 Ky. Acts ch. 105, sec. 9, effective June 17, 1948. -- Created 1946 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 9(a) and (b), effective October 1, 1947.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Furnishing of information as to rates to insured; request for review; appeal; hearing.
